text: Bernard Quilfen (20 April 1949 – 29 January 2022) was a French professional road bicycle racer. He won a stage in the 1977 Tour de France. Quilfen was born in Argenteuil, Val-d'Oise, France. He led the Cofidis team from the 1997 Tour de France. Quilfen died on 29 January 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Argenteuil Category:Sportspeople from Île-de- France
title: Bernard Quilfen
